index.name: Harlos Music
commission.arrangement: Music Arrangement (re-arrangement into different combination of instruments for existing music)
commission.preferStyle: Styles I'm good at: Celtic (European), emotional, mysterious, epic, hopeful
commission.notPreferStyle: Styles I'm not good at or do not prefer: Jazz, Classical, Electronic Music, lively, gorgeous
commission.preferArr: Instruments or Arrangements I'm good at: Orchestra, Concert Band, Piano
commission.notPreferArr: Instruments or Arrangements I'm not good at: Guitars, Vocals, Lyrics
commission.arrNoCommercial: To avoid copyright issues, perpetual commissions is not applicable on arrangements.
commission.iAmNotProMix: I AM NOT PRO IN MIXING.
commission.mixNotice:
If you want to commission Orchestra or Concert band,
I would mainly use Muse Sounds from Musescore4. (Example)
Sometimes I would also use UVI Orchestra. (Example)
Lastly I will adjust the balance, panning and reverb on Reaper.
If you want to commission otherThan Orchestra or Concert band,
You might need a professional mix.
You can pay extra for me to find a mixer. This is discussable.
(It's fine if you want me to mix myself, I'll try my best.)
commission.dm: Please contact me via Discord/Messenger/Twitter with details below.
commission.yourName: Your name: (How I should call you)
commission.musicUsage: Music Usage: (Game, Movie, Charatcer theme ... etc.)
commission.reference: Reference Song/Piece: (would be very helpful if provided)
commission.discussion: Discuss together to see if it works, and I'll give you the quoted price.
commission.screenshot: To ensure rights of both parties, conversations will be screenshotted and preserved.
commission.deposit: Confirm via E-mail, and pay the deposit.
commission.depositDesc: The amount of deposit is half the quoted price but at least USD$ 40.
commission.depositNoReturn: Deposit will not be returned once you have paid it.
commission.draft: I'll make a draft (e.g.: Only melody and piano accompaniment) for you to listen.
commission.draftModify: You can request for modification up to twice. After that, if you are still not happy with it, you shall cancel the commission, though deposit will not be returned
commission.beforeMix: Before going into mixing, I'll send you the half-finished result. If it sounds good to you, you shall pay the rest.
commission.beforeMixModify: You can request for modification up to twice. After that, if you are still not happy with it, you shall cancel the commission, though deposit will not be returned.
commission.mixStage: Starts mixing. I will send via E-mail once completed, to confirm the commission is completed.
commission.recieveFile: Please reply the E-mail indicating you have recieved the result.
commission.googleDrive: I will send the result via Google Drive if the files are too large. You may not request for the files again after confirmation. Please keep the files safely.
commission.after: If you wish to use the commission result in other ways (e.g.: Commercial use for commission that was non-commercial), you can always ask and pay extra afterwards.
commission.priceDisclaimer: Estimated Price is not the quoted price; the quote price is subject to the outcome of discussion.
commission.submit: Submit to other events or competitions
commission.share: Share to personal account AFTER you have publicized
commission.preserveCopyright: Retain moral rights but do not exercise them
commission.getFiles: Demand for musicsheet file, mixing project file and raw track files
commission.publicProcessInAdvance: Publicize/Stream the commission process in advance
commission.sayYouDidIt: Claim it as your own work
